consolidated_propositions.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_rent) AS bar_value, (MAX(average_rent) - MIN(average_rent)) / MIN(average_rent) * 100 AS line_value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

consolidated_propositions.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_rent) AS bar_value, (AVG(average_rent) - LAG(AVG(average_rent)) OVER (PARTITION BY area_name ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date))) / LAG(AVG(average_rent)) OVER (PARTITION BY area_name ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date)) * 100 AS line_value, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS dimension FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, dimension;

consolidated_propositions.sql_query: SELECT YEAR(date) AS time, SUM(restaurant_count) AS value FROM restaurant_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY YEAR(date) ORDER BY YEAR(date);

consolidated_propositions.proposition_description: Restaurant unit growth in Tower Hamlets outpaces London average since 2018
consolidated_propositions.reasoning: 3D visualization shows growth trends over time, emphasizing economic development
consolidated_propositions.chart_title: Tower Hamlets Restaurant Unit Growth
consolidated_propositions.chart_description: 3D divergent bar chart showing restaurant unit growth compared to the London average
consolidated_propositions.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN year >= 2018 AND year <= 2023 THEN unit_growth ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN year < 2018 THEN unit_growth ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, year AS dimension FROM ( SELECT area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS year, restaurant_count - LAG(restaurant_count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY area_name ORDER BY date) AS unit_growth FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2017 AND 2023 ) AS growth_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, year ORDER BY area_name, year;

consolidated_propositions.sql_query: SELECT YEAR(date) AS time, AVG(registration_count) AS value FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Cars' AND YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2015 AND 2023 GROUP BY YEAR(date) ORDER BY YEAR(date);
consolidated_propositions.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM vehicle_data;

donutChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: In 2018, European countries emerged as the predominant birth origin, representing a significant portion of all births.
donutChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A donut chart effectively illustrates the proportion of births by origin, emphasizing Europe's share within the total distribution.
donutChart_simple_2D.chart_title: Birth Origins in 2018: European Dominance
donutChart_simple_2D.chart_description: Visualizing the distribution of birth origins in 2018, highlighting Europe's prominence.
donutChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT country_of_birth AS category, SUM(population_count) AS value, (SUM(population_count) / (SELECT SUM(population_count) FROM birth_country_data WHERE date = '2018')) * 100 AS percentage FROM birth_country_data WHERE date = '2018' GROUP BY country_of_birth ORDER BY value DESC;

lineChart_simple_3D.chart_title: Income Disparity Trends in Central London
lineChart_simple_3D.chart_description: Explore the widening gap between mean and median income from 2008 to 2023.
lineChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT date AS time, average_income AS value, area_name AS dimension FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2008-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY date, area_name, average_income ORDER BY date, area_name;

lineChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Income disparities widened notably in Richmond upon Thames from 2010 to 2020
lineChart_simple_3D.reasoning: A 3D line chart with income brackets as the third dimension shows disparities effectively.
lineChart_simple_3D.chart_title: Income Disparities in Richmond upon Thames
lineChart_simple_3D.chart_description: This chart highlights the widening income disparities in Richmond upon Thames over a decade.
lineChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT date AS time, average_income AS value, income_level AS dimension FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' GROUP BY date, income_level ORDER BY date, income_level;

lineChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Library visits per 1,000 population in Haringey declined steadily from 2010 to 2020
lineChart_simple_3D.reasoning: A 3D line chart with year as the third dimension effectively shows the decline over time.
lineChart_simple_3D.chart_title: Decline in Library Visits in Haringey
lineChart_simple_3D.chart_description: This chart illustrates the decrease in library visits per 1,000 population in Haringey over a decade.
lineChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT CAST(YEAR(date) AS VARCHAR) AS time, SUM(visitor_count) / (population_count / 1000) AS value, area_name AS dimension FROM library_data JOIN population_data ON library_data.area_name = population_data.area_name AND YEAR(library_data.date) = YEAR(population_data.date) WHERE YEAR(library_data.date) BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 GROUP BY YEAR(library_data.date), area_name ORDER BY YEAR(library_data.date), area_name;

lineChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Elderly population in Barnet grew significantly from 2010 to 2023

lineChart_simple_3D.chart_description: This chart shows the significant growth of the elderly population in Barnet over the years.
lineChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT date AS time, population_count AS value, age_group AS dimension FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY date, age_group ORDER BY date, age_group;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Immigrant population from Europe peaked in London boroughs in 2022
comboBarLine_simple_2D.reasoning: The chart provides a clear comparison of absolute numbers and relative percentages of European immigrants

comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows number of European-born residents, line chart shows percentage of total immigrant population
comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS bar_value, AVG(percentage) AS line_value FROM birth_country_data WHERE date LIKE '2022%' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Westminster experiences a surge in crime during the summer months with stable crime rates per capita throughout the year
comboBarLine_simple_2D.reasoning: This combination separates seasonal volume changes from population-adjusted rates, highlighting Westminster's unique seasonal crime trends
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_title: Seasonal Crime Volume vs Rate in Westminster
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows monthly crime counts, line chart shows monthly crime rate per 1000 residents
comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT crime_category AS category, SUM(count) AS bar_value, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) AS line_value FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY crime_category, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) ORDER BY crime_category, line_value;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Newham and Tower Hamlets have the highest concentration of Asian populations
comboBarLine_simple_2D.reasoning: This chart type effectively highlights both the absolute number and the relative percentage of Asian populations
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_title: Asian Population Distribution in Newham and Tower Hamlets
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows number of Asian residents, line chart shows percentage of total population
comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS bar_value, SUM(population_count) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT ethnic_group) AS line_value FROM ethnicity_data WHERE area_name IS NOT NULL AND ethnic_group = 'Broad_group' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Fitness facilities in London boroughs have expanded, with significant growth in budget gyms
comboBarLine_simple_2D.reasoning: The chart highlights the expansion in the number of facilities and the rapid growth of budget gym options

comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, COUNT(DISTINCT gym_name) AS bar_value, COUNT(DISTINCT facility_type) AS line_value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2024 GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: House prices in Westminster have consistently surpassed the London average
comboBarLine_simple_2D.reasoning: This chart highlights both the absolute price levels and their relative position to the London average
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_title: Westminster House Prices vs London Average
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows average house prices, line chart shows percentage difference from London average
comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_price) AS bar_value, AVG(median_price) AS line_value FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Income levels in Kensington and Chelsea are the highest among London boroughs
comboBarLine_simple_2D.reasoning: This chart type effectively contrasts absolute income levels with growth trends
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_title: Income Levels in Kensington and Chelsea

comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(average_income) AS bar_value, AVG(growth_rate) AS line_value FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Library visits per capita are highest in Camden, reflecting strong community engagement
comboBarLine_simple_2D.reasoning: This chart highlights both the total number of visits and their per capita distribution, emphasizing community engagement
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_title: Library Visits per Capita in Camden
comboBarLine_simple_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows total library visits, line chart shows visits per 1000 residents
comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(visitor_count) / COUNT(DISTINCT library_name) AS bar_value, SUM(visitor_count) / (SELECT SUM(population_count) FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' AND area_name = library_data.area_name) * 1000 AS line_value FROM library_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Population density in central London boroughs surpasses outer boroughs significantly

comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS bar_value, AVG(population_count / NULLIF(density, 0)) AS line_value FROM population_data WHERE date = '2021' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Private rents in London have seen a steady increase, with central boroughs showing the highest median rents

comboBarLine_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_rent) AS bar_value, AVG(median_rent) AS line_value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: Central London sees highest growth in licensed restaurant units since 2019

comboBarLine_simple_2D.proposition_description: London boroughs show varied school performance with independent schools outperforming state schools

comboBarLine_with_threshold_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN facility_type = 'Boutique Studio' THEN membership_count ELSE 0 END) AS bar_value, (SUM(CASE WHEN facility_type = 'Boutique Studio' THEN membership_count ELSE 0 END) - LAG(SUM(CASE WHEN facility_type = 'Boutique Studio' THEN membership_count ELSE 0 END), 1) OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date))) / NULLIF(LAG(SUM(CASE WHEN facility_type = 'Boutique Studio' THEN membership_count ELSE 0 END), 1) OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date)), 0) * 100 AS line_value FROM gym_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY borough_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY borough_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date);

divergentBarChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Newham shows the highest concentration of foreign-born residents in 2023
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.reasoning: 3D visualization effectively demonstrates demographic concentration and diversity
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.chart_description: 3D divergent bar chart illustrating the concentration of foreign-born residents compared to other boroughs
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN population_count >= 0 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN population_count < 0 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, country_of_birth AS dimension FROM birth_country_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY area_name, country_of_birth ORDER BY area_name, country_of_birth;

divergentBarChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Burglary rates in Camden shifted dramatically, peaking in winter months
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.reasoning: 3D visualization provides insights into seasonal crime patterns, important for law enforcement strategies
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.chart_description: 3D divergent bar chart illustrating seasonal shifts in burglary rates
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT crime_category AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2022 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, borough_name AS dimension FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY crime_category, borough_name ORDER BY category, dimension;

divergentBarChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Fitness facilities in Hackney grew substantially in 2024, surpassing other boroughs
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.reasoning: 3D visualization emphasizes the growth trend and comparison across boroughs
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.chart_description: 3D divergent bar chart showing the growth of gym facilities compared to other boroughs
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN facility_type = 'positive' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN facility_type = 'negative' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, '2024' AS dimension FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CURRENT_DATE) = 2024 GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;

divergentBarChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Private rents in Hackney have consistently been above the London average since 2020
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.reasoning: 3D chart provides a comprehensive view of rent changes over time and across categories
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.chart_description: 3D divergent bar chart showing private rent changes in Hackney compared to the London average
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2020 THEN average_rent ELSE NULL END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2021 THEN average_rent ELSE NULL END) AS negative_value, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS dimension FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) ORDER BY area_name, dimension;

divergentBarChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Restaurant unit growth in Tower Hamlets outpaces London average since 2018
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.reasoning: 3D visualization shows growth trends over time, emphasizing economic development
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.chart_description: 3D divergent bar chart showing restaurant unit growth compared to the London average
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN year >= 2018 AND year <= 2023 THEN unit_growth ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN year < 2018 THEN unit_growth ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, year AS dimension FROM ( SELECT area_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS year, restaurant_count - LAG(restaurant_count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY area_name ORDER BY date) AS unit_growth FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2017 AND 2023 ) AS growth_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name, year ORDER BY area_name, year;

divergentBarChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Electric vehicle registrations surged in 2023, surpassing diesel vehicles in Outer London
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.reasoning: 3D chart effectively shows the transition and comparison between different vehicle types over time
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.chart_title: Electric vs Diesel Vehicle Registrations in Outer London
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.chart_description: A 3D divergent bar chart depicting the shift in vehicle registrations from diesel to electric
divergentBarChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'Cars' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'Electric' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value, 'year' AS dimension FROM vehicle_data WHERE date LIKE '2023%' GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;

divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.proposition_description: Diversity levels in Brent surpass the multiculturalism threshold in 2023
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.reasoning: Highlights areas of high diversity, important for cultural and social analysis
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.chart_title: Brent's Diversity Levels vs Multiculturalism Threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing diversity levels against a set multiculturalism threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.sql_query: SELECT Area_Name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN diversity_index >= 0 THEN diversity_index ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN diversity_index < 0 THEN diversity_index ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM birth_country_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY Area_Name ORDER BY Area_Name;

divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.proposition_description: Gym facility concentration in Wandsworth exceeds the health infrastructure threshold in 2024
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.reasoning: Highlights areas with exceptional infrastructure, useful for assessing health amenities
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing gym facility concentration against a health infrastructure threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN facility_count >= threshold THEN facility_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN facility_count < threshold THEN facility_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2024 GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY category;

divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.proposition_description: Affordability of housing in Greenwich fell below the affordability threshold in 2023
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.reasoning: Emphasizes affordability issues, important for housing policy and economic analysis
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing housing affordability against a set threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN affordability_index >= 0 THEN affordability_index ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN affordability_index < 0 THEN affordability_index ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM ( SELECT borough_name, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS year, (average_price / median_income) AS affordability_index FROM house_price_data JOIN income_data ON house_price_data.borough_name = income_data.borough_name WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM house_price_data.date) = 2023 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM income_data.date) = 2023 ) AS affordability_data GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY category;

divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.proposition_description: House prices in Kensington and Chelsea remain significantly above the London threshold in 2023
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.reasoning: Highlights deviations above a defined threshold, useful for emphasizing high property values
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.chart_title: Kensington and Chelsea House Prices vs London Threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.chart_description: A divergent bar chart showing property prices in Kensington and Chelsea in comparison to a set threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN average_price >= 0 THEN average_price ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN average_price < 0 THEN average_price ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM house_price_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY category;

divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.proposition_description: Income inequality widened significantly between 2019 and 2023 in London
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.reasoning: Highlights economic disparities, focusing on deviations from an inequality threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing widening income inequality against a defined threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.sql_query: SELECT year AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN inequality_index >= 0 THEN income ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN inequality_index < 0 THEN income ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM ( SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS year, average_income AS income, inequality_index FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ) AS subquery GROUP BY year ORDER BY year;

divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.proposition_description: Library visits per capita in Westminster fall below the expected threshold in 2023
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.reasoning: Effectively highlights areas with lower than expected library usage
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.chart_description: A divergent bar chart showing library visits per capita against a set visitation threshold
divergentBarChart_with_threshold_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(visitor_count) / (SUM(visitor_count) + SUM(book_count)) * 1000 AS positive_value, SUM(book_count) / (SUM(visitor_count) + SUM(book_count)) * 1000 AS negative_value FROM library_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY category;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Asian-born populations in London boroughs have steadily increased since 2010
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart is ideal for showing trends of multiple demographic groups over time.

multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: This chart visualizes the growth of Asian-born populations across different London boroughs over time.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT Year AS time, Broad_group AS series, SUM(population_count) AS value FROM birth_country_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2023 GROUP BY Year, Broad_group ORDER BY Year, Broad_group;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: London's violent crime rates surged in 2023 compared to previous years
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart is suitable for visualizing trends across multiple boroughs over time.

multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: This chart compares violent crime rates over time across various London boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, CONCAT(borough_name, ' - ', crime_category) AS series, SUM(count) AS value FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y'), borough_name, crime_category ORDER BY time, series;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: White British population shows declining trend across London boroughs
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart effectively highlights population trends over time across multiple categories.

multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT year AS time, area_name AS series, SUM(CASE WHEN ethnic_group = 'White British' THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS value FROM ethnicity_data GROUP BY year, area_name ORDER BY year, area_name;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: The number of gym facilities in London has doubled since 2018
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: Multi-line charts are useful for showing growth trends in facilities over time.

multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) AS time, borough_name AS series, COUNT(DISTINCT gym_name) AS value FROM gym_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2018 AND 2023 GROUP BY time, series ORDER BY time, series;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: House prices in outer London boroughs have increased at a slower rate compared to inner London since 2010
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart is effective for comparing growth rates in house prices across regions.

multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, area_name AS series, average_price AS value FROM house_price_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') BETWEEN '2010' AND '2023' GROUP BY time, series ORDER BY time, series;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Income levels in affluent London boroughs have risen faster than in deprived areas since 2015
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: Multi-line charts help in comparing income growth rates across different boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_title: Income Growth Disparities in London Boroughs
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: The chart compares income growth trends in affluent vs. deprived London boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, borough_name AS series, AVG(income_level) AS value FROM income_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') BETWEEN '2015' AND '2023' GROUP BY time, series ORDER BY time, series;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Library visits in London have declined since the onset of the pandemic
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart can effectively illustrate changes in library visit trends over time.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_title: Decline in Library Visits in London
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: The chart visualizes the decline in library visits across London boroughs since the pandemic.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT CAST(YEAR(date) AS TEXT) AS time, area_name AS series, SUM(visitor_count) / (population_count / 1000) AS value FROM library_data JOIN population_data ON library_data.area_name = population_data.area_name WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY YEAR(date), area_name ORDER BY time, series;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Population density in central London has increased significantly since 2000
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart can effectively display density trends across multiple boroughs.

multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: This chart illustrates the increase in population density in central London boroughs over the years.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT date AS time, area_name AS series, population_count / NULLIF(area, 0) AS value FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY date, area_name ORDER BY date, area_name;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Private rental prices in London have outpaced income growth since 2015
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart is ideal for comparing trends in rental prices and income levels.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_title: Rising Private Rental Prices vs Income Growth in London
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: This chart compares the trend in private rental prices against income growth across London boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT CAST(strftime('%Y', date) AS INTEGER) AS time, area_name AS series, AVG(average_rent) AS value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY time, series ORDER BY time, series;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Employment in licensed restaurants has steadily increased in central London
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: Multi-line charts can effectively compare employment growth across different boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_title: Growth in Restaurant Employment in Central London
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: The chart displays employment trends in licensed restaurants across central London boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT YEAR(date) AS time, area_name AS series, SUM(restaurant_count) AS value FROM restaurant_data WHERE YEAR(date) BETWEEN 2010 AND 2023 GROUP BY YEAR(date), area_name ORDER BY time, series;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Performance in London secondary schools shows improvement trends from 2015 to 2023
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart can effectively display performance improvements across multiple schools.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_title: Improvement in Secondary School Performance in London
multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: The chart visualizes performance trends in London secondary schools over the years.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT Year AS time, LANAME AS series, Performance AS value FROM education_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2023 GROUP BY Year, LANAME, Performance ORDER BY Year, LANAME;

multiLineChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Electric vehicle registrations in London have tripled since 2020
multiLineChart_simple_2D.reasoning: A multi-line chart is suitable for showing the growth trend in electric vehicle registrations over time.

multiLineChart_simple_2D.chart_description: This chart shows the increase in electric vehicle registrations across London boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, borough_name AS series, SUM(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'Electric' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS value FROM vehicle_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y'), borough_name ORDER BY time, series;

multiLineChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Eastern European-born populations have increased significantly in London since 2010
multiLineChart_simple_3D.reasoning: 3D charts are useful for showing demographic changes across multiple groups and boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_3D.chart_title: Rise of Eastern European-born Populations in London

multiLineChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT Year AS time, Area_Name AS series, Estimate AS value, Broad_group AS dimension FROM birth_country_data WHERE Year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2023 GROUP BY Year, Area_Name, Broad_group, Estimate ORDER BY Year, Area_Name, Broad_group;

multiLineChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Theft-related crimes peak in December across London boroughs
multiLineChart_simple_3D.reasoning: A 3D chart allows for the visualization of monthly crime patterns across multiple boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_3D.chart_title: Seasonal Peaks in Theft-related Crimes in London
multiLineChart_simple_3D.chart_description: This 3D chart shows theft-related crime trends across London boroughs, highlighting peaks in December.
multiLineChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m') AS time, crime_category AS series, SUM(count) AS value, borough_name AS dimension FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m'), crime_category, borough_name ORDER BY time, series, dimension;

multiLineChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Diverse ethnic groups show varying growth patterns across London boroughs
multiLineChart_simple_3D.reasoning: A 3D chart can effectively display the distribution and growth of multiple ethnic groups.
multiLineChart_simple_3D.chart_title: Growth Patterns of Ethnic Groups in London Boroughs
multiLineChart_simple_3D.chart_description: This 3D chart visualizes the growth patterns of different ethnic groups across London boroughs.
multiLineChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT year AS time, ethnic_group AS series, population_count AS value, area_name AS dimension FROM ethnicity_data GROUP BY year, ethnic_group, area_name ORDER BY year, ethnic_group, area_name;

multiLineChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Income disparities between ethnic groups have widened in London since 2010
multiLineChart_simple_3D.reasoning: A 3D chart can effectively visualize income trends across multiple ethnic groups.
multiLineChart_simple_3D.chart_title: Widening Income Disparities Among Ethnic Groups in London
multiLineChart_simple_3D.chart_description: A 3D chart showing the widening income disparities among different ethnic groups in London.
multiLineChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, ethnic_group AS series, AVG(median_income) AS value, borough_name AS dimension FROM income_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') BETWEEN '2010' AND '2023' GROUP BY time, series, dimension ORDER BY time, series, dimension;

multiLineChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Suburban London boroughs show varying population density trends
multiLineChart_simple_3D.reasoning: A 3D chart allows for the detailed visualization of density trends across multiple boroughs and years.

multiLineChart_simple_3D.chart_description: This 3D chart illustrates population density trends across suburban London boroughs.

areaChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Theft and burglary incidents in Croydon peaked during winter months in 2022

areaChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT year AS time, population_count AS value, ethnic_group AS dimension FROM ethnicity_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 GROUP BY year, ethnic_group ORDER BY year, ethnic_group;

areaChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: House price volatility increased in Central London boroughs between 2010 and 2023

areaChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, AVG(average_price) AS value, borough_name AS dimension FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY time, dimension ORDER BY time, dimension;

areaChart_simple_3D.proposition_description: Income disparities widened significantly in London boroughs from 2010 to 2020

areaChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') AS time, average_income AS value, borough_name AS dimension FROM income_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y') BETWEEN '2010' AND '2020' GROUP BY time, dimension ORDER BY time, dimension;

areaChart_simple_3D.sql_query: SELECT date AS time, population_count AS value, area_name AS dimension FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2000-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' GROUP BY date, area_name ORDER BY date, area_name;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: North London house prices have consistently outpaced the city's average since 2018

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_price) AS bar_value, AVG(median_price) AS line_value FROM house_price_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM house_price_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Income growth in London is highest in tech-driven boroughs
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for growth rates, highlighting tech-driven economic impacts
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_title: Income Growth in Tech-Driven London Boroughs
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows average income, line chart shows growth rate with mean overlay
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(average_income) AS bar_value, AVG(growth_rate) AS line_value FROM ( SELECT borough_name, date, average_income, (average_income - LAG(average_income) OVER (PARTITION BY borough_name ORDER BY date)) / LAG(average_income) OVER (PARTITION BY borough_name ORDER BY date) AS growth_rate FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ) AS subquery GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM income_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Income levels in central London have stabilized post-pandemic
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for stabilization, highlighting post-pandemic economic resilience

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows average income, line chart shows stabilization rate with mean overlay
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(average_income) AS bar_value, AVG(stabilization_rate) AS line_value FROM income_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM income_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(visitor_count) AS bar_value, AVG(visitor_count) * (1 + AVG(growth_rate)) AS line_value FROM library_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM library_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM library_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for growth rates, highlighting outer boroughs' rapid expansion

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS bar_value, AVG(growth_rate) AS line_value FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2015-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM population_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Population density in East London has increased sharply since 2018
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for density increases, highlighting rapid urbanization
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_title: Population Density Increase in East London
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows population count, line chart shows density increase rate with mean overlay
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(population_count) AS bar_value, AVG(population_count / NULLIF(density, 0)) AS line_value FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2018-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM population_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Student accommodation rents in London have stabilized post-2021
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for stabilization, highlighting post-pandemic rent dynamics
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows average student rents, line chart shows stabilization rate with mean overlay
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(average_rent) AS bar_value, (AVG(average_rent) - LAG(AVG(average_rent), 1) OVER (ORDER BY date)) / LAG(AVG(average_rent), 1) OVER (ORDER BY date) * 100 AS line_value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name, date ORDER BY area_name, date;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM rent_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Arts-focused schools in London show a rise in student enrollment
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for enrollment growth, highlighting the popularity of arts education

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT institution_name AS category, AVG(student_count) AS bar_value, AVG(student_count) OVER () AS line_value FROM education_data WHERE institution_type = 'school' AND date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY institution_name ORDER BY institution_name;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM education_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Electric vehicle registrations in London boroughs have surged since 2021
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for growth rates, highlighting the rapid adoption of electric vehicles
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_title: Electric Vehicle Registration Trends in London
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows number of registered electric vehicles, line chart shows growth rate with mean overlay
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(registration_count) AS bar_value, (MAX(registration_count) - MIN(registration_count)) / NULLIF(MIN(registration_count), 0) AS line_value FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_type = 'Electric Vehicles' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY category;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM vehicle_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Public transport reliance reduces vehicle ownership in central London
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for public transport reliance, highlighting its impact on vehicle ownership
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_title: Vehicle Ownership vs Public Transport in Central London
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows number of registered vehicles, line chart shows percentage reliance on public transport with mean overlay
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'Cars' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS bar_value, AVG(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'public_transport_reliance' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS line_value FROM vehicle_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM vehicle_data;

comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Hybrid vehicle registrations in London have doubled since 2019
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.reasoning: The mean overlay provides a benchmark for growth rates, highlighting the adoption of hybrid technology
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_title: Doubling of Hybrid Vehicle Registrations in London
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Bar chart shows number of registered hybrid vehicles, line chart shows growth rate with mean overlay
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'Hybrid' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) AS bar_value, AVG(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'Hybrid' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(LAG(AVG(CASE WHEN vehicle_type = 'Hybrid' THEN registration_count ELSE 0 END)) OVER (PARTITION BY borough_name ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date)), 0) - 1 AS line_value FROM vehicle_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY category;
comboBarLine_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM vehicle_data;

divergentBarChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Knife crime incidents in Lambeth exceeded the London average in 2023
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.reasoning: This chart highlights deviations from the average, effectively showing areas with higher crime rates
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.chart_description: A divergent bar chart showing how knife crime incidents in Lambeth compare to the London average
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT crime_category AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN count >= 0 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN count < 0 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM crime_data WHERE YEAR(date) = 2023 GROUP BY crime_category ORDER BY category;

divergentBarChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Violent crime peaks in summer months across East London boroughs
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.reasoning: Effectively shows seasonal crime patterns, highlighting peak periods
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.chart_title: Seasonal Violent Crime Patterns in East London
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing seasonal variations in violent crime across East London
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT crime_category AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2022 THEN count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM crime_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY crime_category ORDER BY crime_category;

divergentBarChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Property values in Croydon fluctuate significantly more than the London average
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.reasoning: Highlights volatility in property prices, important for market analysis
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing property value fluctuations in Croydon compared to the London average
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT borough_name AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 THEN average_price ELSE NULL END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 THEN -average_price ELSE NULL END) AS negative_value FROM house_price_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2019 AND 2023 GROUP BY borough_name ORDER BY borough_name;

divergentBarChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Library visits in Barking and Dagenham declined sharply post-2020
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.reasoning: Emphasizes changes in public facility usage, important for understanding community engagement
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.chart_title: Decline in Library Visits in Barking and Dagenham
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing the decline in library visits in Barking and Dagenham compared to previous years
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 THEN visitor_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, -SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 THEN visitor_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM library_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) BETWEEN 2020 AND 2023 GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

divergentBarChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Population density in Islington soared above other boroughs from 2010 to 2021
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.reasoning: Effectively shows population changes and density increases over time
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing population density changes in Islington compared to other boroughs
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN population_count >= 0 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN population_count < 0 THEN population_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM population_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

divergentBarChart_simple_2D.proposition_description: Rent affordability in Enfield declined sharply from 2020 to 2023
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.reasoning: Emphasizes affordability changes, important for economic and housing policy analysis
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing changes in rent affordability in Enfield
divergentBarChart_simple_2D.sql_query: SELECT Area AS category, MAX(CASE WHEN affordability_index >= 0 THEN affordability_index ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, MAX(CASE WHEN affordability_index < 0 THEN affordability_index ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM rent_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY Area ORDER BY Area;

divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT area_name AS category, SUM(CASE WHEN restaurant_count >= (SELECT AVG(restaurant_count) FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023) THEN restaurant_count ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, SUM(CASE WHEN restaurant_count < (SELECT AVG(restaurant_count) FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023) THEN restaurant_count ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM restaurant_data WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) = 2023 GROUP BY area_name ORDER BY area_name;

divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Primary school enrollment in Haringey exceeds the London mean since 2021
divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.reasoning: Highlights educational enrollment trends, important for planning and resource allocation

divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart showing primary school enrollment trends compared to the London mean
divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT LANAME AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 THEN enrollment ELSE 0 END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 THEN -enrollment ELSE 0 END) AS negative_value FROM education_data WHERE year BETWEEN 2021 AND 2023 GROUP BY LANAME ORDER BY LANAME;
divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM education_data;

divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.proposition_description: Performance in secondary schools in Richmond upon Thames consistently exceeds London mean

divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.chart_description: Divergent bar chart comparing school performance in Richmond upon Thames to the London mean
divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.sql_query: SELECT LANAME AS category, AVG(CASE WHEN school_performance >= 0 THEN school_performance ELSE NULL END) AS positive_value, AVG(CASE WHEN school_performance < 0 THEN school_performance ELSE NULL END) AS negative_value FROM ( SELECT borough_name AS LANAME, rating AS school_performance FROM education_data WHERE institution_type IN ('school', 'college') AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ) AS subquery GROUP BY LANAME ORDER BY category;
divergentBarChart_with_mean_2D.with_mean: SELECT AVG(value) as mean_value FROM education_data;
